name: Artemis and The Berry Jamboree
description:
You play as a powerful golemancer in a strange new world. You need to rely on summoning berry companions to help you achieve your goal of collecting all of the gems in this formidable land!

CONTROLS:

Mouse to aim, left click to throw berries and pick them, hold right click to call them back to you.

WASD to move. Spacebar used when instructed to.

CREDITS:

Programming, Design, and Music by Will Data

https://twitter.com/artbywilldata

Art by Jennifer Kozlowski and Will Data
